REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2136 reute r f BC-STRYKER-<STRY>-ACQUIR 04-01 0052

TEXT.TITLE: STRYKER <STRY> ACQUIRES HEXCEL <HXL> UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Stryker Corp said it acquired Hexcel Medical Corp, a wholly owned subsidiary of Hexcel Corp. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed. The sale completes Hexcel's plan to sell all its medical products businesses, Hexcel said. Reuter
